content.text:
# List of international trips made by presidents of Iran

This is a list of international trips made by presidents of Iran.
President Masoud Pezeshkian
{| class="wikitable sortable collapsible collapsed" style="margin:1em auto 1em auto;"
|+ List of Trips
|-
! #
! class="unsortable"|Start
! class="unsortable"|End
! Country
! class="unsortable"|Cities
! class="unsortable"|Description
|-
| 1
| September 11, 2024
| September 13, 2024
|  Iraq  Iraqi Kurdistan
| Baghdad, Erbil, Sulaymaniyah, Najaf, Karbala, Basra
|President Pezeshkian had meetings with Iraqi Prime minister, Iraqi President and Iraqi Kurdistan officials
|-
| 2
| September 22, 2024
| September 26, 2024
|  United Nations
| New York City
|President Pezeshkian participated in 79th United Nations General Assembly
|-
| 3
| October 2, 2024
| October 3, 2024
|  Qatar
| Doha
|President Pezeshkian participated in Asian Cooperation Dialogue and had an official meeting with Qatari Emir
|-
| 4
| October 10, 2024
| October 11, 2024
|  Turkmenistan
| Ashgabat
|President Pezeshkian visited Turkmenistan to participate in a cultural summit by invitation of president and national leader of Turkmenistan
|-
| 5
| October 22, 2024
| October 24, 2024
|  Russia
| Kazan
|President Pezeshkian participated in 2024 BRICS Summit
|-
| 6
| December 18, 2024
| December 20, 2024
|  Egypt
| Cairo
|President Pezeshkian participated in Developing 8 Countries summit in 2024 by invitation of Egyptian President Abdel Fattah El-Sisi
|-
| 7
| January 15, 2025
| January 17, 2025
|  Tajikistan
| Dushanbe
|President Pezeshkian visited Tajikistan by invitation of president of Tajikistan Emomali Rahmon
|-
| 8
| January 17, 2025
| January 18, 2025
|  Russia
| Moscow
|President Pezeshkian visited Russia by invitation of president of Russia Vladimir Putin
|-
| 9
| April 28, 2025
| April 28, 2025
|  Azerbaijan
| Baku
|President Pezeshkian visited Azerbaijan by invitation of president of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev
|-
| 10
| May 27, 2025
| May 28, 2025
|  Oman
| Muscat
|President Pezeshkian visited Oman by invitation of Sultan of Oman Heitham bin Tariq
|-
| 11
| July 4, 2025
| July 4, 2025
|  Azerbaijan
| Khankendi
|President Pezeshkian participated in 2024 ECO Summit in Azerbaijan
|-
| 12
| August 2, 2025
| August 3, 2025
|  Pakistan
| Lahore, Islamabad
|President Pezeshkian visited Pakistan by invitation of Prime minister of Pakistan Shehbaz Sharif
|-
| 13
| August 18, 2025
| August 19, 2025
|  Armenia
| Yerevan
|President Pezeshkian visited Armenia by invitation of Prime minister of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan and President Vahagn Khachaturian
|-
| 14
| August 19, 2025
| August 20, 2025
|  Belarus
| Minsk
|President Pezeshkian visited Belarus by invitation of President of Belarus Alexander Lukashenko
|-
| 15
| August 31, 2025
| September 3, 2025
|  China
| Tianjin, Beijing
|President Pezeshkian participated in 25th SCO Summit and a 80th victory parade in Tiananmen square
|-
| 16
| September 15, 2025
| September 15, 2025
|  Qatar
| Doha
|President Pezeshkian participated in Extraordinary Organization for Islamic Cooperation summit
|-
|17
|September 23, 2025
|September 27, 2025
| United Nations
|New York City
|Participation in 80th United Nations General Assembly
|-
|18
|TBD
|TBD
| Kazakhstan
|Astana
|During an interview with Kazinform in Astana, Deputy Foreign Minister of Iran Saeid Khatibzadeh said that president Pezeshkian will visit Kazakhstan at the end of the year and by invitation of President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev
|-
|19
|TBD
|TBD
| India
|New Delhi
|During a meeting between Masoud Pezeshkian and Narendra Modi, Indian prime minister invited Pezeshkian to visit New Delhi
|-
|20
|TBD
|TBD
| Kyrgyzstan
|Bishkek
|President Pezeshkian to participate in 26th SCO Summit in Bishkek at 2026
|-
|21
|TBD
|TBD
| Turkey
|Ankara
|During his first press conference, President Pezeshkian announced that he will visit Turkey
|-
|22
|TBD
|TBD
| Pakistan
|Islamabad
|President Pezeshkian might participate in 27th SCO Summit in Islamabad at 2027
|-
|23
|TBD
|TBD
| Indonesia
|Jakarta
|President Pezeshkian Might participate in Developing 8 Countries Summit in Jakarta in 2027
|-
|24
|TBD
|TBD
| Malaysia
|Kuala Lumpur
|President Pezeshkian will visit Malaysia by invitation of Prime minister Anwar Ibrahim
|-
|25
|TBD
|TBD
| Uzbekistan
|Tashkent
|During a meeting in Ashgabat, President of Uzbekistan Shavkat Mirziyoyev invited President Pezeshkian to visit Uzbekistan
|-
|26
|TBD
|TBD
| Serbia
|Belgrade
|During 79th United Nations General Assembly, a meeting held between president Pezeshkian and president Alexander Vucic of Serbia and Vucic invited Pezeshkian to visit Serbia
|}
President Ebrahim Raisi
